thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com
thread.title: DAVID
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by DAVID

author: DAVID
title: DAVID
text:
Can't say enough about the customer service. Pick-up, drop-off, ease of paperwork etc. I have rented at the Weymouth location about a dozen times over the past few years. From a Prius (yes..., I admit I drove one and actually liked it).. to a Ford Mustang to a big box truck for moving I have never had a problem and always got a fair deal.
The big names could take a few lessons from this local family owned company.
